notes.title: Welcome
notes.text:
Welcome to Note Taker, the exclusive web app for taking notes! 

Instructions:
(1) Click on a note in the left-side column to read its contents
(2) To add a new note,
          (a) Enter a title and note contents if no existing note is being read
          (b) If an existing note is currently being read, click the " + " button
(3) To delete a note, simply click on the garbage can icon next to the note you want to delete.

Enjoy a premium note-taking experience!
